channel.title: Dutch fun orb on the way
channel.description: From arcanists client, also features a portuguese like language 5: [code]aStringArray808 = new String[] { "Loading text", "Lade Text", "Chargement du texte", "Carregando textos", "Tekst laden", "Cargando texto" };[/code]

they have brazilian portuguese now
look at teh flag

item.title: Dutch fun orb on the way
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

Pretty sure thats spanish

EDIT: oh, Carregando - thats standard portugese, afaik

I have to wonder why they are translating to Brazilian Portuguese though, of all things. Does RS really have such a following in south america? Or is it just because they have standard Portuguese already and “hey, its nearly there”

shrug

Read full topic

(old)[/quote] no braz. portuguese is already there but the new lang is much liek bit but like where loading in brazilian is carregando in the new one its cargand or someting
